messages.content: People are fed up with broken promises. The Government has bailed out the banks while local people have suffered.
It's simply not good enough, local people deserve better.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Protect frontline health services and save vital services at the Royal Surrey and St Peter's Hospital.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Choice here is between real change with a new Lib Dem MP or a Conservative with no local track record.

issues.governance: Clean up politics and make government more responsive
issues.health: Protect frontline health services, save vital services at the Royal Surrey and St Peter's Hospital.

leaflet.personalStatement: I've lived in Goldsworth Park, not far from where you live, for over thirty years. I've raised my family here and I work as a nurse caring for local people.

politicalExperience.achievements: Helped people with day-to-day local problems and actions against crime and anti-social behavior

contactInformation.address: 13 Alerton Close, Goldsworth Park, Woking, GU21 3DD

images.caption: Rosie Sharpley - Twenty one years of helping local people

leaflet.additionalNotes: Rosie Sharpley as a nurse will be invaluable at Westminster.
